ygData.subject: Interactivity in Training and Generalization
ygData.msgSnippet: It s interesting the whole new dimension that interactivity adds to training in NE.  We are accustomed to running an experiment offline and coming back when

Subject: Interactivity in Training and Generalization
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=54567749; y=wXXZUPhR4YcBVEv3Ln2b8PZZk26r5_f3ouEYkySX_viAQLfhUnLx
X-Yahoo-Profile: kenstanley01

It's interesting the whole new dimension that interactivity adds to
training in NE.  We are accustomed to running an experiment offline
and coming back when it's done.  But when you can watch the experiment
and interact with it on the fly to get what you want, the process
becomes more powerful.  It makes incremental evolution much more
natural, at least.  This article written by a NERO player is a good
example:

http://www.geocities.com/danekjovax/NERO-Nav1.html

ken
